text: aye imaan waalo tum par maqtulo ka qisaas lena farz kiya gaya hai, azaad, azaad ke badle, ghulam, ghulam ke badle, aurath, aurath ke badle, haan jis kisi ko us ke bhai ki taraf se kuch maafi dedi jaaye, ose bhalaayi ki itteba karni chahiye, aur asaani ke saath diyath27 ada karni chaahiye,t umhaare rab ki taraf se ye taqfeef aur rehmath hai, is ke baadh bhi jo sarkashi kare ose dardnaak azaab hoga
